heading: HR00191
0: RESOLUTION URGING THE DEPARTMENT OF TOURISM (DOT) AND THE NATIONAL COMMISSION FOR CULTURE AND THE ARTS (NCCA) TO IDENTIFY MARINDUQUE AS THE ONE AND ONLY HOME OF THE 'MORIONES FESTIVAL' IN THE PHILIPPINES

FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION URGING THE DEPARTMENT OF TOURISM (DOT) AND THE NATIONAL COMMISSION FOR CULTURE AND THE ARTS (NCCA) TO IDENTIFY MARINDUQUE AS THE ONE AND ONLY HOME OF THE 'MORIONES FESTIVAL' IN THE PHILIPPINES
